item.description:
Many of us have discussed this. Many of us have even got together and tried it. Now we are opening it to all. We will help each person to focus on what they are dreaming about.

Coming to the meetup has home work. Take the time to meditate and clarify what one thing is it that you really want. What is your dream? What are you wanting to tap into? Come with your dream in clear statement form.
"I have a thin, healthy body with flow of ease that tells me what it need at any given time and I understand my body is a miracle. I am a healthy weight, and know that I will always have this health."
This is a short example.
We will let each person have a personal rampage of appreciation for a minimum of 64 seconds while we support them through it. When one wins we all win.

Come to the program with you one wish, dream or soon to be reality. We as a group will chant with you.

6:30 to 8:00pm.
item.why: I have just got back from a cruise with Kevin Trudeau. I have even more to offer the night we do this program. Please come with something you want to create, something near and dear to your heart. We are going to ROCK!!!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: 64 seconds of Solid Thought for Each of Us!
